parameters:
\N<Doctor>Hey there, Miss Segi. Do you need anything at this clinic?
Feel free to consult me anytime you feel something off with
your body, haha.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Doctor>Hey there, Miss Segi. Do you need something from the clinic?
Feel free to consult me anytime you feel something's off
with your body, haha.
\N<Segi>Um... I have something I'd like to discuss.

\N<Doctor>A discussion? What's on your mind, Miss Segi? Don't tell me
you're expecting another little one?
\N<Doctor>After what happened, if that's the case, I'd be delighted.
\N<Segi>N-no... that's not it...
\N<Segi>It's about... what's written in this book.
\N<Doctor>A dermal toxin with a weakness...? And its ingredients...?

\N<Segi>...Yes. I need it for a certain reason. I was hoping you
might have it here...

\N<Doctor>Hmm... Unfortunately, we don't have it here. But I have
heard of where the raw materials can be found.
\N<Segi>R-really?! Could you tell me where that is?!

\N<Doctor>I can't guarantee it, but... I've heard it grows deep within
the ruins.

\N<Doctor>However, the ruins are currently under Luda's jurisdiction.
It would be difficult to collect it unless you're a
participant in the training corps who has free access to the
ruins.

\N<Doctor>If you could... if you could bring me about five roots of
that material, I wouldn't be averse to refining the toxin
for you here.
\N<Segi>Grows deep within the ruins...
DW_目標設定 Head_to_the_ruins_and_search_for_the_ingredients_of_the_transdermal_poison.
A
\N<Doctor>Hey there, Miss Segi. How are you feeling?
\N<Segi>Um...

\N<Doctor>Oh...? Have you gathered the ingredients I mentioned? But
how on earth did you...

\N<Segi>About that... With these, you can refine a weak poison that
can be naturally expelled, right?

\N<Doctor>Hmm... I understand. I'm curious how Miss Segi managed to
collect this, but a promise is a promise. Let's try to
refine it.

\N<Doctor>However... there will be a small fee for my trouble, you
know?
\N<Segi>Understood... Thank you very much.

\N<Doctor>Then, please stop by here again after a while. I should have
the refining process completed by then.
DW_目標設定 Killing_time_before_heading_back_to_the_clinic_again.
B

\N<Doctor>Then, after a while, please drop by here again. By that
time, let's have the refining process finished, shall we?

\N<Doctor>Hey there, Segi-san. The usual item is ready. It's a bit
pricey, but it's something you need, right?
SupponSS makeShop 2 1
SupponSS addItem 2 44 -1 1
SupponSS addItem 2 64 -1 20
SupponSS openShop 2 1
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1

\N<Man>This is the only clinic in town. The Luda gang has taken so
many things, but I want to believe they wouldn't go as far
as to take this...

\N<Old Woman>...Many people have been injured at the training grounds.
Yet, they say not a single one has received treatment here.

\N<Old Woman>Then where on earth are they getting treated... Could it
possibly be, or perhaps...

\N<Woman>Um... I'm visiting here regarding the matter of pregnancy. I
hope it leads to a good outcome...

\N<Segi>I'm sure the treatment room is just ahead... We can't enter
without permission.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

The preparation status for the Training Assembly has been
updated. Let's open the notepad.
DW_目標設定 Gathering_information_for_the_training_session.
A
